description.value:
A Gelatine substance that can be smeered or stuck onto a surface. Once applied it activated by an electrical spark. Rapidly burns through hull plates without requiring oxygen. Comes in a Tube that can cover ~1m^2 or a thin line 5m long. Deals the same damage as a melta bomb (6d10, Pen 12) but over the course of a minute before burning out.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 200 T
